title: Print 10 Even Numbers
question: Write a program to print the first 10 even numbers.
description: Use a loop and print each even number on a new line.

title: Print 10 Odd Numbers
question: Write a program to print the first 10 odd numbers.
description: Use a loop and print each odd number on a new line.

title: Sum of First N Numbers
question: Write a program to calculate the sum of first N numbers.
description: Use a loop to sum numbers from 1 to N.
hint: Use a for loop and accumulate the sum

title: Factorial of N
question: Write a program to calculate factorial of a number N.
description: Use a loop to multiply numbers from 1 to N.
hint: Use a for loop and multiply

title: Fibonacci Series
question: Write a program to print first N Fibonacci numbers.
description: Use a loop to generate Fibonacci sequence up to N terms.
hint: Use previous two numbers to calculate next

title: Check Leap Year
question: Write a program to check if a year is a leap year.
description: A year is leap if divisible by 4 but not by 100, or divisible by 400.

title: Positive or Negative
question: Check if a number is positive, negative, or zero.

title: Max of Two Numbers
question: Write a program to find maximum of two numbers.
description: Print the larger number between A and B.

title: Grade Calculator
question: Calculate grade based on marks.
description: Print A, B, C, or F based on score ranges.

title: Even or Odd Array
question: Check each number in array if even or odd.
description: Print 'Even' or 'Odd' for each element in array.

title: Sum of Array Elements
question: Calculate sum of elements in an array.
description: Sum all numbers in the given array.
hint: Use a loop or reduce function

title: Max in Array
question: Find maximum number in an array.
description: Return the largest number in array.

title: Reverse Array
question: Reverse the given array.
description: Print array elements in reverse order.
hint: Use a loop from end to start

title: Count Even Numbers in Array
question: Count even numbers in array.
description: Return the count of even numbers.

title: Array Sum Greater than N
question: Check if sum of array elements is greater than N.
description: Return true if sum > N else false.

title: Palindrome Number
question: Check if a number is palindrome.
description: Print 'Yes' if number is palindrome, else 'No'.
